catalogue_raissonne: Bartsch 2 (vol. 8, p. 363); New Hollstein 2; Zschelletzschky p. 80ff; Geisberg, Westfälische Kunsthefte, Heft 9, 1939, p. 66
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: Adam and Eve at L standing under a fruit tree; robed figure at R with a beard holds up PL hand, addressing the couple
inscription:
Signature, Date

-- in graphite on verso, center of sheet: B2
-- noted in upper left corner of mat: 83/6
portfolio: From From the Story of Adam and Eve, Plate 2
provenance: [C.G. Boerner, Düsseldorf, cat. 83, no. 6, sold October 16, 1985, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: monogram and date in plate, lower right: [AG / 1540]
title: God Warns Adam and Eve, From the Story of Adam and Eve, Plate 2
